comments: Kafka needs 28% Effect Hit Rate to guarantee Shock on 40% Res enemies. Build as much SPD as possible so she can detonate DoTs. Break Effect Rope can also be considered in niche cases. Genius of Brilliant Stars set is great against Quantum weak enemies (and when you pair Kafka with Silver Wolf).
substats: SPD = ATK% > Effect Hit Rate until 28% > Break Effect% / Crit / HP% / DEF%
name: Kafka DoT
